actions.text: On agreeing to the Hastert amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment requires the Director of the Office of National Drug Control Policy to develop a 10-year master plan for the use of mycoherbicides to control narcotic crops in the United States and internationally.
purpose: An amendment, numbered 2 and printed in the Congressional Record, to require the Director of the Office of National Drug Control Policy to develop a 10-year master plan for the use of mycoherbicides to control narcotic crops.
